translations: 商品化形象；商品化；推销
经营；推销（merchandize 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: We are trying to broaden our contacts as to be able to do more effective merchandizing.
sentences.translation: 我方正努力扩大联系以便能有效地推销。

sentences.sentence: We are trying to broaden our contacts so as to be able to do more effective merchandizing.
sentences.translation: 我方正努力扩大联系以便能有效地推销。

sentences.sentence: In particular, we'll look at how this approach can be applied in the Merchandizing business.
sentences.translation: 我们要特别来看下这种方法在商品促销中是如何用的。
